ygData.subject: Re: Sound effects discovery (off topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: Notice when you go down that list of games with environmental audio presets, they are all fairly old games... introduced before EAX extensions were available.
ygData.messageBody:
Notice when you go down that list of games with environmental audio presets,
they are all fairly old games... introduced before EAX extensions were
available. Environmental audio presets are for games that do NOT have
environmental audio supports built into the game. EQ uses the environmental
abilities of the sblive card already... any preset you use with the game
would likely deteriorate your experience.

Are you sure the creative labs website isn't just stating that EQ supports
EAX? (can't check from here)

----Original Message Follows----
From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
On a related note, according to the Creative labs website, there is a preset
Environment Audio setting for EQ for the SBLive soundcard. I have been
unable to locate this setting. I have been using the default Multi Speaker
setting for my soundcard. Does anyone know if an Environmental Audio
setting for EQ exists and if so how I can go about downloading it?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci
<< text3.html >>
